name: LifeLight (ProfDeCube)
description:
LifeLight

In this game, things only move while in the light.

You can unplug wires and use them to power other devices, buttons need to be held while lever toggle.
Clocks cycle between giving power and not.
Enemies will send you back to the start of the level if they hit you in the light

Controls:
A & D to move
Space to jump
Mouse to interact with environmental objects
R to restart level

Created for the 48 hour Lux Jam: https://itch.io/jam/lux-jam following the theme of Light & Shadow
